input.sentences: the awards ceremony was on a monday .
we gave awards to each participant in the program .
these people all had a success story in them .
they came from all walks of life .
at the end we took a group photo .
output.sentences: It was Monday at an awards ceremony.
The participants of a program received an award.
It was nice to hear success stories of people.
Everyone came from all walks of life.
Here is a photo of the whole group together.
